entity.entitySummary: Stores the status of how a party uses/used a circumscription.
entity.entityDescription: This entity is an intersection entity between the circumscription entities and the party entity.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value corresponding to a unique usage of a circumscription by a given party.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the CIRCUMSCRIPTION table.
attribute.attDefinition: This attribute stores the key pointing to a specific circumscription.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the PARTY tbale.
attribute.attDefinition: This attribute stores the key pointing to a specific party.
This attribute stores the status of a circumscription as it is used by a specific party. At this time, the status may be standard or non-standard.
This is the date on which a party stated using a specific circumscription.
This is the date on which a party stops using a specific circumscription.
